SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.repository.implementation

Class CartRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.peaslimited.shoppeas.repository.implementation.CartRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CartRepository
@Repository public class CartRepositoryImpl extends Object implements CartRepository
Implementation of CartRepository for managing shopping cart data in Firestore, including methods to retrieve, update, and delete shopping cart information.
